alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ISLE OF WIGHT... NORTHEASTERN SOUTHAMPTON...NORTHEASTERN SUSSEX AND SOUTHERN SURRY COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 434 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Homeville, or near Waverly, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Waverly around 440 PM EDT. Wakefield around 450 PM EDT. Dendron around 455 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Booth Fork, Carsley, Pons, Newville, Gwaltney Corner, Ellis Fork, Raynor, Runnymede, Beachland, and Delk Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Isle of Wight; Southampton; Surry; Sussex
